name: Melissa Quintanilha, Co Founder, Head of Design
description: We found the session very valuable, with lots of actionable insights we can implement on [our] website. We really appreciate you taking the time, and providing your expert review of our site.

name: Vera Mao, Founder & CEO
description: I had a 1h consult with AJ of Experiment Zone and was blown away by how much actual value I received from the consultation! AJ went through my entire customer journey with me on the call and provided actionable insights and pointers for improvement to increase conversion rate. I even received a detailed deck summary of the pointers specific to my brand after my call. I highly recommend any e-commerce business owners to have this chat with AJ - All value, no pushy sales! Thank you AJ.

name: Chris M. Sica
description:
Hot Take On Conversion Optimization:

It's SO HARD! I thought that my website UX skills were solid, but I learned something from AJ Davis at Experiment Zone.

I was way to close to my product. I had been staring at our website for The Ronin Society for weeks and I went through a few different stages:

I LOVE IT
I HATE IT
I LOVE IT AGAIN
I HATE IT AGAIN
I DON'T WANT TO LOOK AT IT

Luckily, AJ and her team at Experiment Zone are giving the gift of a free conversion consult as part of the #COVIDCRAP initiative.

Thanks for the helpful advice for improving our conversions! If you need actionable advice on your website, book a free session.

name: Phang Jun Yu, Co-Founder
description:
Anyway, this review isn't sponsored or anything and just a way for me to return the 1-hour favor! We also sent her 2 copies of our product Lord of the Chords because AJ just happened to be a musician and board game lover as well!

If anyone's interested, shout out to AJ Davis at Experiment Zone for the gift of a free conversion consult as part of the #COVIDCRAP initiative. Thanks for the helpful advice for improving our conversions! If you need actionable advice on your website, book a session.
